classes.name: SimplePointCloud
classes.docstring: A simplified point cloud class that doesn't rely on Open3D

methods.name: add_points
methods.docstring: Add points to the point cloud

methods.name: classify_points
methods.docstring:
Classify points as objects, boundaries, or voids.
In this simplified version, we just simulate the classification.

methods.name: generate_void_points
methods.docstring: Generate void points in the spaces between objects

methods.name: compute_spatial_signature
methods.docstring:
Compute a spatial signature based on the distribution of points.
This is a simplified version that doesn't rely on 3D geometry.

methods.name: visualize
methods.docstring:
Create a 2D visualization of the point cloud.
This is a simplified version that doesn't rely on 3D visualization.

functions.name: generate_test_scene
functions.docstring:
Generate a test scene with multiple objects and interesting negative space.

Returns:
    SimplePointCloud object
